subtitle: These biscuits are full of healthy goodness.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Very lightly grease a baking sheet.
Rub the butter into the flour until the mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs.
Add sugar, almonds, honey and half the oats. Mix together and knead until a dough is formed. Break off pieces of dough about the size of walnuts. Roll in the remaining oats and flatten.
Place the biscuits on the baking sheet - a little apart as they will spread during cooking. Bake for 15-20 min or until pale golden brown.

title: Almond oat biscuits
